page.title: 05A new housing estate.
page.content: Behind our school, Macleans the builders are building a new housing estate. Eventually there will be over {600 houses}on this estate. There are maisonettes, two, three and four bedroomed houses. Some are detached, some are semi-detached, some have garages, others have en-suite shower rooms. They are built mainly from brick, but some have stone facing. There are{no play areas or shops}on the estate. All the houses have a front and back garden. Some of the bigger houses have balconies. We think the estate is being built here because we are on the edge of the city of {Sheffield near to the M1.}Many of the children from school play on the building site when the builders have gone home, making dens and bicycle tracks. {Simon and Claire, aged 9. High Green J/I School.
